section.p: You meet an actor who wishes to return to the town where he was born, to see his aged mother. ‘But I have not had much success in my chosen profession,’ he explains. ‘If my mother sees me in these poor rags she will die a disappointed woman. I don’t want her last thoughts to be full of worry for my future.’
He offers to sell you his only possession, a finely made dragon mask. He will not sell for less than 100 Shards, and obviously would not normally even go as low as that.
Pay him whatever you are willing to give (if anything) and .
